results.name: Find a way out: Abode of darkness.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8. 10
  • Processor: intel core i3 3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6250.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 510 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8. 10
  • Processor: intel core i3 8100

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
